response.overview: Get Lost in Korea tells a story of exploration, photography, blogging and friendship.  You can expect a mix of humor, tradition, adventure and stunning imagery; as I team up with Jesse Day: a Canadian entertainer who lives in Seoul and raps in Korean.  Highlights include me catching and eating a live octopus, attending an exorcism and learning zen martial arts from monks.  Now, I invite you to sit back, click “full-screen” and enjoy the show.  - See more at: http://www.adventuresofagoodman.com/watch-get-lost-in-korea-online/#sthash.rlvltmez.dpuf
response.title: Get Lost in Korea
